system.description:
You dedicated yourself to sharing knowledge with others, whether in a formal school or as a private tutor. The work taught you patience, clarity, and the understanding that every student learns differently. Even when not teaching you still find yourself explaining things to your companions.
**Skills:** Society 2, History 2, Persuasion 1, Empathy 1, +40 XP
**Equipment:** General topic book, quill, ink, robe, papyrus parchment x5, shoes
**Feature** - Educator: You can explain complex topics simply and effectively. When teaching skills to others, they learn faster (GM discretion on mechanical benefits).
